com.gdx.game.controller.entities

Class BonusController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gdx.game.controller.entities.EntityController
      • com.gdx.game.controller.entities.BonusController

  • public class BonusController
extends EntityController
    This class is used to control bonus placement.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BonusController(BonusModel.BonusType type)
      Creates a new bonus with said type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isVisible()
      Indicates if this bonus is set to be visible or not.
      void placeBonus(float ballCurrentZ)
      Places this bonus in a semi random position the x position is an int between -16 and 16 the y position is always set to 1 the z position is an int between -500 and 0 plus a given z coordinate
      void replaceBonus(float ballCurrentZ)
      Replaces this bonus in a semi random position the x position is an int between -16 and 16 the y position is always set to 0 the z position is an int between -500 and 0 plus a given z coordinate
      void setVisible(boolean visible)
      Sets this bonus visibility options.

      • Methods inherited from class com.gdx.game.controller.entities.EntityController

        dispose, getBody, getInitialColor, getModel, getView, getWorldTransform, moveToPos, setCurrentColor, setInitialColor, setModel, setPos, setView, setWorldTransform, updateModel

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Indicates if this bonus is set to be visible or not.
        Returns:
        this BallController visible

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible(boolean visible)
        Sets this bonus visibility options.
        Parameters:
        visible - this BallController visible new value

      • placeBonus

        public void placeBonus(float ballCurrentZ)
        Places this bonus in a semi random position the x position is an int between -16 and 16 the y position is always set to 1 the z position is an int between -500 and 0 plus a given z coordinate
        Parameters:
        ballCurrentZ - represents a z position from which the bonus placement will be done

      • replaceBonus

        public void replaceBonus(float ballCurrentZ)
        Replaces this bonus in a semi random position the x position is an int between -16 and 16 the y position is always set to 0 the z position is an int between -500 and 0 plus a given z coordinate
        Parameters:
        ballCurrentZ - represents a z position from which the bonus placement will be done
